# successes(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an array of resolution results based on a set of media items you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
class func successes(with resolvedMediaItems: [INMediaItem]) -> [INAddMediaMediaItemResolutionResult]
```

## Parameters

- **resolvedMediaItems**: The items that are relevant for the userâ€™s intent.

## Return Value

An array of new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAddMediaMediaItemResolutionResult] objects.

## Discussion

When the system calls [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAddMediaIntentHandling/resolveMediaItems(for:with:)], if your app can identify relevant media for the intent, use this method to create results for each of those media items.

## Providing Successful Results

- **init(mediaItemResolutionResult:)**: Creates a result that involves successfully adding a media item.
